description:
~~> The MOST Popular, MOST Downloaded Interactive Christmas Storybook! 
~~> Voted the VERY BEST Multimedia Book for 2011 Christmas! 
~~> A Spectacular Reading Experience for Christmas & the Holiday Season!
  
The Christmas Tale is back and better than EVER!  It brings the joy of Christmas and the festivities of the holiday season together in a magnificent interactive story. Packed with even more gorgeous HD graphics and sound effects, young kids will experience Santa, the elves, his sleigh and reindeer and the excitement of Christmas through a beautifully written story combined with engaging activities both children and their parents will love!  

This charming Christmas Tale story combines the power of the Christmas spirit and the joy of giving, together in a fantastic and interactive story. Come meet Santa and his wife at home in the North Pole as they prepare for Christmas. 

The Christmas countdown is on - and a “Countdown” clock shows just how many days there are until Christmas. Listen to Santa’s crackling fireplace that roars as a family of elves warms themselves in front of it. Play with the kids outside as they make snowballs and tap the snowman and see all of his cool outfits. Watch the kids dream about Santa and Christmas morning. Join Santa and his reindeer as he delivers presents to kids around the world. And finally, watch the kids on Christmas morning with their brand new gifts.

What’s Inside:
> Christmas Countdown Clock - Shows how many days there are until Christmas in REAL TIME
> Christmas Piano - Decorate the Christmas tree with ornaments that sound like piano keys
> Christmas Wish List - Compose a Christmas wish for Santa! 
> Jigsaw puzzles - Awesome puzzles enhance the story and promote critical thinking skills
> Paint-a-Picture - Dozens of coloring pages and paints
> Counting - 1 to 10 counting game is cool and fun   
> Memory Match - Fire up your child’s memory skills!   
> Placement Puzzle - Place a character in their puzzle piece 
> Find the Item - Critical thinking skills and memory come together in this fun activity
> Memorize and Place - A great memory game that sharpens retention

Features:
> Engage in numerous fun activities on every page and experience an interactive Christmas story like never seen before!
> “Read to Me” will automatically read the story to you
> “Read it Myself” will allow you to control the reading yourself
> “Auto Play” automatically reads the entire story to you
> Recording Microphone that allows you to create your own dialogue for the characters
> Kids learn to spell the words

ABOUT TabTale
With over 350 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. TabTale’s interactive storybooks provide an exciting reading experience for the most beloved children's stories. Each book inspires young children’s creativity and imagination.
Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ 
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale
Follow us:@Tabtale
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale

CONTACT US 
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: 
* This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.
Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
